The electrostatic force between two charges

Two electric charges are interacting. The first charge carries −7,341 nC−7,341 nC of charge, and the second carries −2,087 nC−2,087 nC of charge.

The distance between the two charges is 3,921 cm3,921 cm.

Assume that both charges are point-like.

What is the magnitude of electrostatic force 𝐹F, of the one charge on the other?

INSTRUCTION:
  • Enter your answer in scientific notation (use your calculator's SCI-mode).
  • Round your answer to 3 decimal places after the decimal comma.
  • Use the values for any physical constants you might need, as listed here.
Answer: 𝐹=F= NN
